thread.title: Fall in construction activity steepens

title: Fall in construction activity steepens
text:
Tue, Jul 7, 2015, 11:53 AM NZST - New Zealand Markets close in 5 hrs 7 mins Fall in construction activity steepens AAP – 3 minutes 56 seconds ago Recommend Print 
Construction activity has continued to contract as the fall in mining-related projects overshadows expansion in the housing sector. 
The Australian Industry Group/Housing Industry Association Performance of Construction Index fell 1.4 points to 46.4 in June, staying below the 50 level that marks contraction from expansion. 
"The shrinking of the resources and energy investment pipeline is a clear constraint on the industry and the economy as a whole," Ai Group director of public policy Peter Burn said in a statement on Tuesday. @YahooNZBusiness on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook Billson rules out super access changes AAP
